author: admin3
title: Israel bombardeia escola da ONU em Gaza alegando que escondia base do Hamas
text: 06/06/2024 - 18:51 Ao menos 37 pessoas morreram nesta quinta-feira (6), segundo fontes m√©dicas, no bombardeio a uma escola da Ag√™ncia das Na√ß√µes Unidas para os Refugiados Palestinos (UNRWA) na Faixa de Gaza que servia de base para o movimento islamista Hamas, segundo Israel. ‚ÄúAvi√µes de combate (‚Ä¶) fizeram um ataque preciso contra base do Hamas situada no interior de uma escola da UNRWA na regi√£o de Nuseirat‚Äù, matando ‚Äúv√°rios terroristas‚Äù, informou o Ex√©rcito israelense. O porta-voz militar israelense, Daniel Hagari, declarou posteriormente que ‚Äúnove terroristas‚Äù morreram no ataque contra salas de aula onde, segundo ele, escondiam-se cerca de 30 combatentes do Hamas e da Jihad Isl√¢mica. O diretor da UNRWA, Philippe Lazzarini, afirmou que as for√ßas israelenses bombardearam, sem aviso pr√©vio a escola, que ‚Äúabrigava 6.000 deslocados quando foi atacada‚Äù. O hospital M√°rtires de Al Aqsa, na cidade pr√≥xima de Deir al Balah, afirmou que recebeu corpos ‚Äúde 37 m√°rtires‚Äù. Um fot√≥grafo da AFP viu palestinos retirando colch√µes manchados de sangue e examinando os destro√ßos da escola, que abriga deslocados dos quase oito meses de guerra entre Israel e Hamas na Faixa de Gaza. ‚ÄúPor que nos bombardeiam? Fugimos de um lado para outro. N√£o h√° local seguro. Nenhuma escola da UNRWA √© segura. Nenhuma barraca de campanha √© segura‚Äù, disse √† AFP Faisal Thari, uma das pessoas alojadas no recinto bombardeado. O Hamas, no poder em Gaza, denunciou um ‚Äúnovo crime‚Äù e instou a comunidade internacional a pressionar Israel para p√¥r fim a ‚Äúestes massacres brutais‚Äù. O secret√°rio-geral da ONU, Ant√≥nio Guterres, afirmou que o ataque contra a escola constitu√≠a ‚Äúum novo exemplo terr√≠vel do pre√ßo pago pelos civis (‚Ä¶) que simplesmente tentam sobreviver e se veem for√ßados a se deslocar em uma esp√©cie de c√≠rculo da morte em Gaza para tentar se proteger‚Äù, disse seu porta-voz, St√©phane Dujarric. Os Estados Unidos pediram que Israel d√™ informa√ß√µes ‚Äútotalmente transparentes‚Äù sobre o ocorrido. O chefe da diplomacia da Uni√£o Europeia, Josep Borrell, pediu uma investiga√ß√£o independente. Al√©m do ataque √† escola, testemunhas reportaram disparos de foguetes no centro da Faixa de Gaza. A avia√ß√£o israelense tamb√©m bombardeou Rafah, assinalou √† AFP uma fonte nessa cidade do sul do territ√≥rio palestino, fronteiri√ßa com o Egito. O Ex√©rcito informou que foram mortos tr√™s suspeitos que tinham tentado cruzar a cerca fronteiri√ßa de Gaza na regi√£o de Rafah. O conflito em Gaza teve in√≠cio em 7 de outubro, quando comandos islamistas mataram 1.194 pessoas, civis em sua maioria, no sul de Israel, segundo um balan√ßo da AFP com base em dados oficiais israelenses. Os milicianos tamb√©m sequestraram 251 pessoas. Israel afirma que 120 continuam cativas em Gaza, das quais 41 teriam morrido. Em repres√°lia, Israel lan√ßou uma ofensiva na Faixa de Gaza que deixou at√© agora 36.654 mortos, tamb√©m civis na maioria, segundo o balan√ßo mais recente do Minist√©rio da Sa√∫de do governo do Hamas. Israel enfrenta um isolamento crescente, com a√ß√µes nos tribunais internacionais por acusa√ß√µes de crimes de guerra e o reconhecimento da Palestina como Estado por v√°rios pa√≠ses. A Espanha anunciou, nesta quinta-feira, a decis√£o de se somar √† √Åfrica do Sul em seu processo contra Israel na Corte Internacional de Justi√ßa (CIJ) por suposto ‚Äúgenoc√≠dio‚Äù contra os palestinos em Gaza, uma acusa√ß√£o que Israel nega taxativamente. ‚ÄúNosso √∫nico objetivo √© p√¥r fim √† guerra e come√ßar a avan√ßar, por fim, na aplica√ß√£o da solu√ß√£o de dois Estados‚Äù, afirmou o ministro espanhol de Assuntos Exteriores, Jos√© Manuel Albares. Os mediadores Catar, Egito e Estados Unidos prosseguem com seus esfor√ßos para alcan√ßar um cessar-fogo poucos dias depois de o presidente americano, Joe Biden, apresentar um plano de a√ß√£o que, segundo ele, foi proposto por Israel. A iniciativa contempla, em uma primeira etapa, um cessar-fogo de seis semanas, a retirada israelense das regi√µes mais populosas de Gaza e a troca de alguns ref√©ns nas m√£os do Hamas por palestinos presos em Israel. Biden e outros 16 dirigentes, v√°rios deles da Europa e da Am√©rica Latina, urgiram o Hamas a aceitar um acordo de cessar-fogo. ‚Äú√â hora de que a guerra termine e este acordo √© o ponto de partida necess√°rio‚Äù, declarou a Casa Branca em nota, tamb√©m assinada, entre outros, pelos chefes de Estado ou de governo de Brasil, Argentina, Col√¥mbia, Espanha, Fran√ßa, Reino Unido e Alemanha. Mas um alto dirigente do Hamas afirmou que o movimento n√£o havia recebido at√© o momento nenhuma proposta por escrito. ‚ÄúN√£o h√° nenhuma proposta, s√£o s√≥ palavras ditas por Biden em um discurso‚Äù, disse √† AFP o l√≠der islamista Osama Hamdan. bur-gl/ib/mas-dbh/avl/fp/aa/jb/aa/mvv

author: @zazoomblog
title: Napoli dopo Gilmour anche MCTOMINAY | il centrocampista della Scozia si riscatta dopo il gol annullato Il VIDEO
text: Fonte : calcionews24 di 5 set 2024 Napoli dopo Gilmour anche MCTOMINAY | il centrocampista della Scozia si riscatta dopo il gol annullato Il VIDEO Napoli, dopo Gilmour anche MCTOMINAY: il centrocampista della Scozia si riscatta dopo il gol annullato. Il VIDEO (Di gioved√É¬¨ 5 settembre 2024) Il Napoli si gode i propri gioielli. Sia Gilmour che MCTOMINAY hanno segnato nel match tra Scozia e Polonia Sempre pi√É¬π Euro- Napoli . La Scozia ha rimontato le due reti di svantaggio grazie ai gol dei nuovi acquisti azzurro: prima il tiro potente di Gilmour per il momentaneo 2-1 e poi il 2-2 realizzato da MCTOMINAY . Leggi tutta la notizia su calcionews24 Notizie su altre fonti Scozia-Polonia, dopo Gilmour ecco McTominay: il centrocampista del Napoli firma il gol del 2-2 (VIDEO) - com/gvQ2U3v2C0 √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù Frank (fan) (@TenHagEra) September 5, 2024 The post Scozia-Polonia, dopo Gilmour ecco McTominay: il centrocampista del Napoli firma il gol del 2-2 (VIDEO) appeared first on SportFace. . Dopo [√¢‚Ç¨¬¶]. calcionews24 McTominay e Gilmour titolari in Scozia-Polonia: Napoli in vetrina in Nations League - Una vetrina importante per i nuovi gioielli del Napoli, che potranno mostrare le loro qualit√É in un contesto internazionale. Per gli appassionati del Napoli, per√É¬≤, sar√É comunque una serata da seguire con attenzione. La Nations League si conferma cos√É¬¨ un palcoscenico di primo piano, dove i talenti del calcio europeo si mettono in mostra. E stasera, a Glasgow, i riflettori saranno puntati sui due nuovi beniamini del Maradona. napolipiu Nations League, Scozia-Polonia: la pareggia il nuovo acquisto McTominay! - Ancora un po√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢ di azzurro napoli nella sfida di Nations League tra scozia e Polonia. A pareggiare i conti sul 2-2 √É¬® stato il nuovo acquisto azzurro McTominay, ex United, alla sua prima esperienza al di ... mondonapoli Napoli, il video del GOL di Gilmour con la Scozia: prima quello ANNULLATO a McTominay - Tanto napoli in questa scozia : nel match con la Polonia prima il gol annullato di McTominay, poi quello convalidato a Gilmour Asse caldissimo quello tra scozia e napoli . Nella gara del Nations League ... calcionews24 Scozia-Polonia, il "napoletano" Gilmour va in gol. author: Reuters
title: EE.UU. emite una alerta de tormenta geomagn√©tica severa por primera vez en dos d√©cadas
text:
EFE Latam EE.UU. emite una alerta de tormenta geomagn√©tica severa por primera vez en dos d√©cadas Leer todo el art√≠culo Agencia EFE 10 de mayo de 2024, 11:30 a. m. ¬∑ 2 min de lectura
Washington, 10 may (EFE).- Una tormenta geomagn√©tica, causada por una serie de erupciones solares y que podr√≠a ser la m√°s severa desde 2005, alcanzar√° la Tierra este viernes al anochecer, seg√∫n inform√≥ la Oficina Nacional de Administraci√≥n Oce√°nica y Atmosf√©rica (NOAA, en ingl√©s).
"Tenemos por delante un acontecimiento muy, muy raro", dijo en una conferencia de prensa Shawn Dahl, coordinador en el Centro de Predicci√≥n del Clima Espacial (SWPC, en ingl√©s) en Boulder, Colorado.
Los vientos solares que se mueven directamente hacia la Tierra a casi 800 kil√≥metros por segundo alcanzar√°n el planeta hacia las 20:00 hora del este (24:00 GMT)
"Hemos notificado a los operadores de infraestructura cr√≠tica, incluidas las comunicaciones, los sat√©lites y las plantas de energ√≠a el√©ctrica", a√±adi√≥ el funcionario.
PUBLICIDAD SWPC ha alertado tambi√©n a la Agencia de Gesti√≥n de Emergencias (FEMA), pero no espera "un colapso pasivo catastr√≥fico".
Las tormentas geomagn√©ticas, explic√≥ el portavoz, pueden tener impacto en la infraestructura orbital terrestre y en la superficie de la Tierra con el potencial de interferir con las comunicaciones, la red de energ√≠a el√©ctrica, la navegaci√≥n y las operaciones de radio y de sat√©lites.
La serie de erupciones comenz√≥ el 8 de mayo y las condiciones para la tormenta persista podr√≠an durar todo el fin de semana.
"Una gran mancha solar ha producido erupciones desde moderadas a muy fuertes desde el mi√©rcoles", se√±al√≥ la agencia. "Al menos cinco de esas erupciones estuvieron asociadas con eyecciones de masa de la corona solar que parecen dirigidas hacia la Tierra".
Estas eyecciones son explosiones de plasma y campos magn√©ticos en la corona solar que causan tormentas geomagn√©ticas cuando ocurren en direcci√≥n a la Tierra, explic√≥ NOAA.
La gran mancha solar ha lanzado una secuencia asombrosa de cinco eyecciones de masa solar hacia la Tierra, seg√∫n la plataforma Spacewather.com, que estima que, si se tratara de un hurac√°n, ser√≠a de categor√≠a 4.
(c) Agencia EFE
M√ÅS POPULARES 1. Meli√° apunta alto: Busca un EBITDA de 525 millones y la apertura de 30 nuevos hoteles en 2024 2. Agree Realty: Una oportunidad de ‚Äúcomprar en la ca√≠da‚Äù con un gran dividendo 3. En decisi√≥n un√°nime: Banxico deja sin cambios su tasa de inter√©s en 11% 4. Ethereum podr√≠a alcanzar esta incre√≠ble cifra, seg√∫n an√°lisis de las condiciones del mercado 5. El Tesoro pretende colocar entre 5.750 y 7.250 millones de euros en bonos y obligaciones del Estado

author: Michael De Sapio
title: ‚ÄúThe Miracle of the Bells‚Äù: A Forgotten Novel & Film
text: The Miracle of the Bells doesn‚Äôt claim to be great literature, but it is a richly-drawn story about faith and Hollywood, a time capsule of a bygone era that retains its inspirational charm. [The Miracle of the Bells](https://smile.amazon.com/Miracle-Bells-Classic-Reprint/dp/0243272715/ref=sr_1_2?ie=UTF8&qid=1513492669&sr=8-2&keywords=miracle+of+the+bells) by Russell Janney (510 pages, Forgotten Books, 1946) [Back in 1947 it was possible for a Catholic novel to shoot to the top of the national bestseller list in the U.S.A. That‚Äôs exactly what happened to Russell Janney‚Äôs The Miracle of the Bells. Janney (1884-1963), a theatrical producer by trade, produced Miracle as his first novel at the mature age of sixty-two and soon found himself a bestselling author. But after being made into an all-star movie in 1948 and going through various reprintings, the novel fell out of print and into obscurity. I recently stumbled across an old used copy of Miracle at my library‚Äôs book sale. Janney (who may or may not have been a Catholic‚Äîinformation on him is scarce) not only spins an entertaining yarn (and, at 475 pages, a long one), but fills his book with a wealth of poetic detail that reveals a vivid sacramental imagination.](https://smile.amazon.com/Miracle-Bells-Classic-Reprint/dp/0243272715/ref=sr_1_2?ie=UTF8&qid=1513492669&sr=8-2&keywords=miracle+of+the+bells) The novel tells the story of theatrical press agent William ‚ÄúWhite Spats‚Äù Dunnigan, who helps small-town Polish-American girl Olga Treskovna rise above the shabby world of burlesque and land a starring role in a Hollywood religious epic; and of how, before the picture can be released, the girl‚Äîwhom Dunnigan secretly loves‚Äîdies from a lung infection she contracted as a child in the Pennsylvania coal mines, causing the film to be shelved. Devoted to Olga even after her death, Dunnigan brings her body back to her hometown of Coaltown, Pennsylvania for burial; he also engineers a publicity stunt by having funeral bells rung for three straight days in her parish church. From here on, the novel takes shape as a sort of Easter play, a redemptive tale in which diverse characters are progressively drawn into the circle of goodness radiating out from Olga. What had started as a tragedy transforms into a jubilant comedy (in the ‚Äúdivine‚Äù sense) as goodwill and cooperation among many people result in the release of Olga‚Äôs film, the renovation of St. Michael‚Äôs Church, the reformation of a village atheist, and numerous other wonders. Miracle proved a great success with the reading public but received decidedly mixed reviews from the critics. Some faulted it for na√Øve plotting and characterizations and for sentimentality. Others, misunderstanding Janney‚Äôs sacramental exuberance, thought that he was out to ‚Äúsell‚Äù religion in a crass way. As is well known, the Golden Age of Hollywood produced many Catholic-oriented works (think of [The Bells of St. Mary‚Äôs](https://smile.amazon.com/Bells-St-Marys-Bing-Crosby/dp/B00F6SHECS/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1513492161&sr=8-1&keywords=The+Bells+of+St.+Mary%E2%80%99s) or [The Song of Bernadette](https://smile.amazon.com/Song-Bernadette-William-Eythe/dp/B00008LDO7/ref=sr_1_1?s=movies-tv&ie=UTF8&qid=1513492177&sr=1-1&keywords=The+Song+of+Bernadette)), and a number of directors seem to have been interested in the potential of film to create pictorial realizations of the faith. (The connections between faith and Hollywood in this period are amusingly portrayed in the Coen Brothers‚Äô recent movie [Hail, Caesar!](https://smile.amazon.com/Hail-Caesar-Blu-ray-DVD-Digital/dp/B01B8836R6/ref=sr_1_2?s=movies-tv&ie=UTF8&qid=1513492200&sr=1-2&keywords=Hail%2C+Caesar%21), which makes an interesting companion piece to [The Miracle of the Bells](https://smile.amazon.com/Miracle-Bells-Fred-MacMurray/dp/B00BMQODGI/ref=sr_1_1?s=movies-tv&ie=UTF8&qid=1513492224&sr=1-1&keywords=The+Miracle+of+the+Bells).) But to what extent can one ‚Äúmarket‚Äù or ‚Äúsell‚Äù the faith? This is the dilemma that faces press agent Bill Dunnigan, who at one point muses: ‚ÄúYou couldn‚Äôt promote a priest, a church, a saint, as you would a musical show or Eddie Cantor or a feature film. Or could you?‚Äù The answer turns out, surprisingly, to be yes; and throughout the novel, we learn of Dunnigan‚Äôs unique way of achieving this. This novel about faith and Hollywood was fairly begging for film treatment, and sure enough in 1948 the movie version of The Miracle of the Bells appeared, starring Fred MacMurray, Alida Valli and Frank Sinatra (as Father Paul, the parish priest). Often dismissed out of hand as saccharine, the movie is, in fact, a rather somber post-war document filled with film noir touches. Many viewers regard it as a Christmas movie, owing to a touching Christmas Eve scene between Dunnigan and Olga at a Chinese restaurant. There were several changes from the novel to the film. In the novel, the movie Olga stars in is a non-specified religious picture; in the movie it is an adaptation of [Joan of Arc](https://smile.amazon.com/Joan-Arc-Mark-Twain/dp/0898702682/ref=sr_1_1?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1513492281&sr=1-1&keywords=Joan+of+Arc), which increases the sense of her as a martyr. The novel‚Äôs plot is condensed, with many subplots eliminated. But what you don‚Äôt get from watching the movie is Janney‚Äôs poetic descriptions and wonderfully textured sense of Catholicism. Janney gives us a vision of the world as a theater, the liturgy as its greatest ‚Äúshow,‚Äù and God as the ‚ÄúGreat Producer‚Äù of the drama of salvation. As Dunnigan and Father Paul stand on a hill overlooking Coaltown sorting out their dilemmas, they have a sort of religious experience in which the landscape itself becomes a kind of liturgy: Is that green mountain not like a great altar? Those pine trees are the giant candlesticks which the setting sun is lighting. See how they seem to drip hot flame on the altar cloth of hickory and birch. During Olga‚Äôs funeral, Dunnigan‚Äîa lapsed Catholic who has not set foot inside a church in years‚Äîlikens the choir loft to a theater balcony and the sides of the sanctuary to ‚Äúthe wings‚Ä¶ of the stage of this consecrated theater.‚Äù In another scene, the debonair Dunnigan‚Äôs white spats are likened to the leg armor of St. Michael on his mission to fight the devil. In passages like these, Janney shows a symbolic imagination reminiscent of Chesterton. The ‚Äúmiracle‚Äù of the book‚Äôs title occurs during Mass one day at St. Michael‚Äôs as a group of statues suddenly appear to turn towards Olga‚Äôs casket. Father Paul realizes at once that this apparent miracle has a natural explanation: The movements of the soil, occasioned by the mining activity nearby, caused the statues to tilt. (Janney emphasizes the Catholic Church‚Äôs clearheaded and skeptical attitude toward verifying the miraculous.) Yet Dunnigan urges Father Paul not to tell this to the people and thus crush their faith. That the statue episode will restore the faith and hope of the suffering people of Coaltown will be miracle enough. As the local bishop puts it: Many of those out there will realize again, perhaps for the first time in months, in years, the beauty of the Mass, that greatest miracle of all. Do we have to explain that miracle? The wine into Christ‚Äôs blood? The wafer into His Body? There are two sharply contrasted priests in Miracle: poor and humble Father Paul of St. Michael‚Äôs, and snobbish Fr. Spinsky of the upscale St. Leo‚Äôs, who comes to a conversion of heart. There is also a strong hint of the inter-faith cooperation and consensus that were such an ideal in this era. The Jewish movie mogul who is producing Olga‚Äôs film is eventually won over by Dunnigan‚Äôs campaign to release it and eventually contributes to the renovation of St. Michael‚Äôs. The novel avoids facile resolutions; everyone does not convert to Catholicism in the end. But we sense how even the most worldly person (like Dunnigan) can be drawn into the orbit of the faith, and how diverse people can live with their differences and cooperate for a higher good. Janney seems to have been trying to write a book that was not only Catholic but catholic in the fullest sense. [It‚Äôs not possible to mention here all the episodes and characters in this teeming novel‚Äîsuch as the surprisingly earthy scene in which Dunnigan brawls with a blaspheming atheist union leader. But suffice it to point out a possible allegorical reading: Coaltown as the world, Olga as the Christ figure whose death redeems her deeply flawed people, Dunnigan as the Christian disciple. At one point Janney evokes the words of Jesus, ‚ÄúAnd lo, I am with you always, even unto the end of the world.‚Äù The dead Olga‚Äôs presence endures, communing with Dunnigan at various moments of the novel, underlining the irrelevance of death in the face of goodness and beauty.](https://i0.wp.com/theimaginativeconservative.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/Screen-Shot-2022-12-25-at-8.42.25-PM.png?ssl=1) The Miracle of the Bells doesn‚Äôt claim to be great literature on the order of Georges Bernanos or G.K. Chesterton (even if Janney‚Äôs imagery occasionally recalls the latter). But it is a richly drawn work of popular Catholic fiction, a time capsule of a bygone era of American Catholicism that retains its inspirational charm. The combination of sanctity and Hollywood pizzazz is unique. Should you be able to obtain one of the rare copies of this forgotten book, I recommend it this Christmas season, or any season of the year. Republished with gracious permission from [Crisis Magazine](http://www.crisismagazine.com/2016/miracle-bells-forgotten-catholic-novel) (2016). This essay was first published here in December 2017. The Imaginative Conservative applies the principle of appreciation to the discussion of culture and politics‚Äîwe approach dialogue with magnanimity rather than with mere civility. Will you help us remain a refreshing oasis in the increasingly contentious arena of modern discourse? Please consider [donating now](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=5XB3QPV5AHZ98). The featured image is courtesy of [Pixabay](https://pixabay.com/photos/bells-church-church-bells-iron-5073209/). All comments are moderated and must be civil, concise, and constructive to the conversation. Also, comments containing web links or block quotations are unlikely to be approved. Keep in mind that essays represent the opinions of the authors and do not necessarily reflect the views of The Imaginative Conservative or its editor or publisher.

author: Brett Davis
title: UK vehicle production falls 44.6% in August, Nissan Qashqai big drop in Australia - PerformanceDrive
text:
Vehicle production in the UK has plummeted 44.6 per cent in August as another wave of COVID-19 rips through the country. Recent efforts to ramp up production have stalled due to the virus, with car production in the country down 40.2 per cent so far this year. This effects various makes and models exported around the world, including to Australia. In Australia, the Nissan Qashqai is the biggest-selling UK-made vehicle.
At a 40.2 per cent drop this year, it means 348,821 fewer vehicles have been produced in the UK compared with the same period last year. Not only is that a loss of around ¬£9.5 billion to local car producers, which is going to be very damaging to their bottom lines, it also means some customers haven‚Äôt been able to take delivery of their new vehicles.
According to the Society of Motor Manufacturers and Traders (SMMT), only 51,039 vehicles were produced in the UK during August. The findings show that weak demand from key overseas markets has also caused the downfall, and figures are being reflected against what happened to be a strong month of August last year.
Production of vehicles for export markets dropped 41.1 per cent, with just 43,244 units made for overseas markets. This shows that almost 85 per cent of all vehicles made in the UK in August were destined for overseas markets. Mike Hawes, SMMT chief executive, said:
‚ÄúThese are increasingly disturbing times for UK car makers and suppliers with the coronavirus crisis weighing heavily on the sector. Companies are bracing for a second wave with tighter social and business restrictions making the industry‚Äôs attempts to restart even more challenging.‚Äù
Although international markets, including Australia, aren‚Äôt likely to be immediately impacted by the slump in August, the follow-on effect is expected to contribute to the overall downturn in new vehicle sales reported in various regions this year. Revenues for carmakers are also expected to be drastically down, which could also cause some critical decisions to be made. Hawes said:
‚ÄúThe UK industry is fundamentally strong and agile, and the measures announced yesterday by the Chancellor are welcome and essential, although we await more details of how they will work for all businesses and crucially large manufacturers. Companies need to retain skilled jobs and maintain cashflow and we may need more support to boost business and consumer confidence later this year.‚Äù
How has this impacted the Australian new vehicle market?
In Australia, various new vehicles are produced in the UK. Almost all Australian-delivered new Land Rover and Range Rover models are produced there, except for the Discovery and Defender, which are made in Slovakia. Most Jaguar models destined for Australia are also made in the UK, except the I-PACE and E-PACE, which are made in Austria.
Most ‚Äì but not all ‚Äì MINI models sold in Australia are also manufactured in the UK, as well as the Honda Civic Type R, Nissan Juke, Nissan LEAF and Nissan Qashqai. Other obvious British marques have manufacturing hubs in the UK, including Bentley, Lotus, McLaren and Rolls-Royce.
Taking a look at Australian new vehicle registration figures for August (we‚Äôll call them sales for brevity), 12,694 English-made vehicles have been sold so far this year (according to VFACTS). That‚Äôs down 34.9 per cent on the same eight-month period last year. Just 807 of those were in August, which is down a whopping 68.3 per cent compared with the month of August last year. For comparison, the local industry overall is reporting a 20.4 per cent downturn in sales across the board, year-to-date (YTD).
How do the figures look for those UK-made models? Land Rover sales (includes Range Rover) are down 32.4 per cent year-to-date, and down 62.3 per cent compared with last August. Jaguar sales are also down 38.3 per cent YTD and down 69.7 per cent for August.
VFACTS figures don‚Äôt show Honda Civic Type R sales specifically, so we can‚Äôt see the potential impact there. Overall Civic sales (regular models are made in Thailand) are at 4847 through August though, down 33.6 per cent, and down 68.5 per cent for the month.
Interestingly, Nissan Juke sales are up 12.1 per cent YTD, perhaps due to the new model just arriving. LEAF sales are also up 10.6 per cent through the year to the end of August, but down 65.3 per cent for the month of August alone.
The Nissan Qashqai is reporting the biggest drop, with sales down 36.9 per cent YTD and down a massive 80.9 per cent for the month of August. The Qashqai is the best-selling UK-made vehicle in Australia, reporting 4857 sales so far this year. It seems to be showing the biggest impact of stalled UK vehicle production in August, regarding the Australian market anyway.
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->manufacturing and engineering
Economy, Business and Finance->financial and economic news

author: EFE
title: Una ONG denuncia la muerte de 14 personas en una z√≥diac al sur de Canarias
text:
Al menos catorce personas han muerto ahogadas en una z√≥diac cuyos ocupantes llevan pidiendo auxilio desde las 14.00 horas de este jueves desde un punto del Atl√°ntico situado a unos 55 kil√≥metros de Cabo Bojador, en la costa marroqu√≠ del S√°hara Occidental, al sur de Canarias , porque su barca se desinfla y se hunden .
Es la denuncia que realiza la activista Helena Maleno, fundadora de Caminando Fronteras, ONG que lleva toda la tarde de este jueves en contacto con los n√°ufragos y que ha transmitido su posici√≥n a las autoridades espa√±olas y marroqu√≠es para que movilicen medios de rescate. Por la localizaci√≥n del incidente, ha asumido la emergencia Rabat.
Maleno ha facilitado a EFE una foto enviada por los supervivientes que todav√≠a siguen a flote , una imagen nocturna y borrosa en la que se ve a entre seis y siete personas sentadas a horcajadas sobre un flotador de una neum√°tica, doblado y medio deshinchado.
Y tambi√©n un audio que le ha remitido una de las ocupantes de la patera. En √©l se escucha a una mujer decir en franc√©s: "Estamos aqu√≠, Helena. Soy una mujer embarazada de nueve meses , estoy en el flotador (de la z√≥diac). Todos los chicos del medio (de la embarcaci√≥n) han desaparecido, la gente est√° desapareciendo, hasta ahora no hemos visto a la Marina".
"Toda la gente est√° desapareciendo. ¬°Por favor ay√∫dennos, ay√∫dennos! ¬°Estamos aqu√≠, ay√∫dennos! Estamos sentados as√≠ en el flotador (se refiere a la imagen que adjunta con el audio). Es muy peligroso, el agua est√° entrando", se lamenta la mujer
Helena Maleno ha explicado a EFE que, seg√∫n la informaci√≥n que han recabado sobre esa neum√°tica, se trata de un grupo de 58 personas que salieron el mi√©rcoles desde la costa del Sahara hacia Canarias y que ahora se encuentran al suroeste de Cabo Bojador.
Entre ellos, a√±ade, hay siete mujeres (incluyendo a la embarazada) y dos ni√±os .
La portavoz de Caminando Fronteras denuncia que, hasta el momento, Marruecos no ha hecho llegar ayuda a los ocupantes de esa neum√°tica, ni tampoco Salvamento Mar√≠timo espa√±ol ha intervenido.
Por eso, expresa su temor a que ocurra lo mismo que el 21 de junio, cuando varias personas murieron al hundirse una z√≥diac al sur de Gran Canaria despu√©s de pasar toda la noche esperando a que llegara una patrullera de Marruecos, porque la emergencia la hab√≠a asumido el Centro de Coordinaci√≥n de Salvamento de Rabat.
Y ello, a pesar de que un barco de rescate espa√±ol hab√≠a estado a solo una hora de distancia de navegaci√≥n de ellos, socorriendo a otra patera , cuando ya se conoc√≠an sus coordenadas.
Ese suceso dio lugar una denuncia de la Fiscal√≠a de Canarias por presunto delito de omisi√≥n del deber de socorro contra los responsables del operativo en Espa√±a, denuncia que desde este verano instruye un Juzgado de Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, que ha declarado secretas las actuaciones.

Barbara Hershey est une fois de plus extraordinaire dans ce r√¥le. Cette com√©dienne est tellement talentueuse et capable de jouer une palette de personnages diff√©rents et riches en √©motions.Ce...
